original_title: Secrets of The Ring w/ Raven Vol. 3
overview: Raven is as funny as ever as he talks about a number of subjects including locker room etiquette, respect for veterans, the kangaroo court in WWE, taking too many bumps and lots, lots more. Raven brings up never told before stories to illustrate all his points. There is no telling what subject will come up next. You'll hear his thoughts on the controversy between Lance Storm, JBL and Bob Holly and who Raven thinks was right and why. There is also a story every young wrestler must hear about Mike Sanders and Triple H. Raven uses stories about some of wrestling's biggest names like The Rock and Jerry Lawler to teach you valuable lessons about the wrestling business. Raven also gives a firsthand account of a shoot incident between Vordell Walker and Rick Steiner and why Steiner reacted the way that he did. Not only will you hear Raven give the inside scoop, but you will see the incident.
title: Secrets of The Ring w/ Raven Vol. 3
